form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Vitter introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To direct the General Accountability Office to conduct a full audit of hurricane protection funding and cost estimates associated with post-Katrina hurricane protection.

section.header: Audit of hurricane protection funding and cost estimates

subsection.text: Not later than 270 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Government Accountability Office, in coordination with the National Academy of Engineering, shall conduct and submit to Congress a full audit of hurricane protection funding and cost estimates associated with post-Katrina hurricane protection.
The purposes of the audit shall beâ€”

paragraph.text: to conduct an analysis of resources available and work required with respect to hurricane protection funding and post-Katrina hurricane protection; and
to identify strategies to replenish reprogrammed funding from out-year work to immediate needs.
